p: The predominant VOCs of the C. acaulis cypselae were the degradation products of higher fatty acids, obtained probably via enzymatic or oxidative hydrolysis of chemical bonds. 2- and 3-methylbutanoic acids are common compounds associated with fatty acid metabolism or lipid peroxidation. 2-Pentylfuran and hexanal are known products of linoleic acid oxidation while nonane, decane, limonene, and dodecane derive from oleic acid [ 42].
